resources.string: Provides weathers of multiple cities at a time on your Home Screen. It refreshes 8 times daily.

CityWeather is an Widget which shows weather forecast of multiple cities (max 10 cities at a time), straight on your Home Screen.
It will refresh 8 times a day to get latest forecast details of your selected cities. 

I have hosted the project under Apache License 2.0 on www.code.google.com
